title: The World Health Organization — under attack by Trump — was targeted by conservatives in 1948, too - The Washington Post

content:
During its creation in 1948, the World Health Organization faced attacks from American conservatives, just as it has become a target for President Trump amid the coronavirus pandemic.
Back then, some Republicans suspected the WHO would be influenced by the S… [+6460 chars]
